id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield.

namespace.description: The namespace in which the metafield is defined.

key.description: The key or title that identifies the metafield.

value.description: The actual value of the metafield.

value_type.description: The type of value stored in the metafield (e.g., string, integer, boolean).

description.description: The description or additional information about the metafield.

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the resource owner associated with the metafield.

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated.

owner_resource.description: The resource type of the owner (e.g., Customer, Product) of the metafield.

type.description: The data type of the metafield value.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield accessible via the Admin GraphQL API.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the metafield.
